field.label: Remove Blocked Hosts Interval
field.help: Please select the amount of time you would like hosts to be blocked. Note this setting is only applicable when using Legacy Mode blocking! This setting is ignored when using Inline IPS Mode.

field.label: Log to System Log
field.help: Copy Suricata messages to the firewall system log.

field.label: Log Facility
field.help: Select system log facility to use for reporting. Default is LOCAL1.

field.label: Log Priority
field.help: Select system log Priority (Level) to use for reporting. Default is NOTICE.

field.help: Rules, GeoIP and IQRisk update notifications.
